>
>This is easily solved. Just don't expose the individual variants. 
>

Bu=
t I want to be able to maintain the site with a WebDAV client, which means =
accessing the individual variants with multiple methods.  A 404 response is=
 inconsistent with this need, since the resource does indeed exist at the r=
equested URL.  On the other hand, a 303-redirect (bypassed if method !=3D G=
ET) opens the desired image for editing if the accessing WebDAV client is a=
n image editor.  How well this works remains to be seen, as we've only begu=
n implementing WebDAV on our system, but that's my thinking on 300 vs. 400.=


-Eric
